title: Roulette Wheel VR
description: Multiplayer roulette game with gesture-based betting in VR.
shortDesc: Experience the thrill of live roulette in virtual reality. Place your bets with intuitive hand gestures, interact with a lifelike wheel, and enjoy multiplayer casino realism with voice chat, animated avatars, and physics-based chipsâ€”all in an immersive VR space.
roles: Developed immersive VR roulette gameplay with physics-based chip placement and gesture-driven UI.
Integrated hand tracking for natural betting gestures, chip grabbing, and table interaction.
Implemented real-time multiplayer table logic with synced bets, wheel spin, and result animations.
Optimized 3D assets and interactions to maintain stable VR performance on Oculus Quest hardware.
Collaborated with design, animation, and audio teams to simulate realistic casino ambiance.
Built user state handling for bet timers, game rounds, session rejoin, and spectator modes.
Tested seated and standing VR experiences for input comfort and play fluidity.

contributions.name: Gameplay & Bet Handling
contributions.shortDesc: Developed core roulette mechanics with bet validation and round flow.
details: Implemented logic for inside and outside bets, number targeting, and win/loss resolution.
Created visual bet zones on the table with live feedback on placement and stack size.
Built betting timer and lockout controls to sync all players to a shared round state.
Simulated realistic wheel spin physics with result animation and chip collection.

contributions.name: VR Interaction & Gesture Control
contributions.shortDesc: Enabled natural interaction through VR hand tracking and controller support.
details: Allowed players to grab, drag, and place chips using hand gestures or VR controllers.
Added gesture-based undo and bet confirmation actions for frictionless gameplay.
Used collider-driven zones for chip placement accuracy and visual alignment.
Tested and refined interaction thresholds for consistent input across players.

contributions.name: Multiplayer & Networking
contributions.shortDesc: Created a real-time, multi-user roulette environment.
details: Integrated Photon to synchronize chip placements, spin results, and payouts.
Built player join/leave logic with visual seat assignment and host fallback.
Implemented voice chat with positional audio for realistic in-room communication.
Added server-side validation of round results to ensure fair outcomes.

contributions.name: Visual Polish & Casino UX
contributions.shortDesc: Designed immersive VR casino scenes and polished interactions.
details: Modeled roulette tables, chips, and UI with high visual fidelity and clean layout.
Used lighting, reflections, and particle effects to enhance the spin and win moments.
Implemented avatar gestures, eye contact, and proximity-based reactions for immersion.
Optimized all assets for Quest-grade hardware performance and visual quality balance.
